description: A 7-day balanced nutrition plan following Harvard Healthy Eating Plate principles: half plate vegetables/fruits, quarter whole grains, quarter healthy protein. Targets 30% protein, 40% carbohydrates, and 30% fat at 2000 calories. Includes 3 meals plus 1 snack daily with diverse whole foods. Based on 2024 Dietary Guidelines for Americans and Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health recommendations.
scaling_notes: Scale all 'scalable: true' ingredients proportionally. Maintain balanced plate ratio: increase protein, carb, and fat sources evenly. Fixed items (seasonings) stay constant.

instructions: Mix oats, yogurt overnight. Top with berries, almonds, honey.
Serve with boiled egg whites.
Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through
Cook quinoa according to package instructions until tender
Cut broccoli into uniform florets

Slice avocado and set aside
Assemble bowl with quinoa, grilled chicken, and steamed broccoli
Top with sliced avocado and drizzle with olive oil
Roast chicken 200°C 22 min.
Rinse quinoa under cold water
Bring 2 cups water to boil, add quinoa
Reduce heat and simmer covered for 15 minutes , roast asparagus and carrots.
Serve together.

Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk until combined
